name: Space Adventurer (mccul200)
description:
This is my final submission for project 3, which I named Space Adventurer

The changes I made are as follows:

1) One new level focusing on getting a key for a door, then backtracking to the start of the level.

2) A level focusing on straightforward progression with some enemies with a final goal surrounded by danger.

3) A final very challenging level where the player has to deal with a rising acid while making it through the level's obstacles. 

Credits - Created By: Maximus McCulloch
